mtsho mang po dang / /smon lam rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med tshul 'jug pa/ /mig 'phrul lta bu de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba ma lus kun kyis byin rlabs te/ /phyi mtha'i
skal par spyod byed kun tu bzang po rnams/ /zhing rnams 'byam klas kun tu gzugs brnyan byung gyur pa/ /chos 'od byed pa de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/ /gang rnams ye shes nyi ma'i snying rje'i
dkyil 'khor can/ /'gro ba nyam nyes mthong zhing chos kyi 'od snang bas/ /'gro ba'i mun pa bstsal cing bstan pa 'char 'byung ba/ /nyi ma lta bur de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/ /skye dgu srid pa'i
rgyud na 'gro ldog mthong gyur nas/ /yid gsal 'khor ba rnams phyir zlog la rab gnas shing / /chos kyi 'khor lo kun nas yongs su sgrub byed pa/ /spyod pa kun bzang dam pa'i blo can rab tu
spyod/ /tshul 'dir bslabs pa de dag mtha' dang dbus med pa'i/ /lus rnams bsam pa ji bzhin 'gro bar nyer bstan te/ /gzugs brnyan mig yor 'dra ba'i rang lus tshad med pas/ /
srid pa'i rgya mtsho dag na 'gro mang yongs smin byed/ /byams tshul shin tu yangs pas 'gro mang rgyas bkang ste/ /mos pa sna tshogs 'gro la rnam par spyod bstan nas/ /'gro la bsam pa ji
bzhin chos kyi char 'bebs shing / /brtan pa byang chub don du sems can khrag khrig 'dul/ /de nas shakya'i bu mo go bas tshigasu bcad pa de dag smras nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad la rnam par blta ba'i yul
thob pa'o/ /nor bzangs gyis smras pa/ 'phags ma byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i tshul rnam par lta ba'i yul de ji
lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'di la snyoms par zhugs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bskal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mthong zhing khong du chud par byed do/ /bskal pa de dag gi sems can lam gyi rgyud thams cad du gtogs pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes
so/ /sems can de dag gi shi 'pho dang skye ba'i sgo ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /mngon par 'grub pa'i sgo ji snyed cig yod pa dang / las dang mngon par 'du byed pa yongs su
bsgrub pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / las rnam par smin pa sna tshogs ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /de dag gi las yongs su blangs pa dge ba yang rab tu shes so/ /mi
dge ba dang 'byung ba dang mi 'byung ba dang / nges pa dang ma nges pa dang / log par nges pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang bcas pa dang / bag la nyal ba med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs
pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rgud par gyur pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su zin pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su zin pa dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba yongs su zin pa dang / de
dag gi dge ba'i chos yongs su 'dus pa dang / sdig to'i chos yongs su 'dus pa'i las yongs su blangs pa yang rab tu shes so/ /bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i
rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig byung ba de dag gi mtshan rgya mtsho yang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi
thugs dang po bskyed pa rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/ /smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bsgrub
pa yang rab tu shes so/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas byung ba rnams kyi drung du gshegs pa rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas la mchod cing rim gror mdzad pa'i sbyor ba rgya
mtsho yang rab tu shes so/ /sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/ /'byung ba'i rgyan rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/ /sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / btul ba rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/ /mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mdzad pa rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so/ /
chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang rnam par 'phrul pa yang rab tu shes so/ /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang rab tu shes so/ /sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /'khor kyi dkyil 'khor de dag na nyan thos ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag gi 'byung ba'i tshul yang
rab tu shes so/ /sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang rab tu shes so/ /lam bsgoms pa sna tshogs kyang rab tu shes so/ /ye shes thob par bya ba phun sum tshogs shing rnam par dag pa'i
bye brag kyang rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dgis sems can ji snyed cig rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la bkod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas de dag gis sngon

gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub khong du chud pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas de dag gi zhi ba'i rnam
par spyod pa la rnam par rtse ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas de dag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag
kyang rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas de dag gi sems can ji snyed cig yongs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas de dag gis chos bstan pa ji snyed cig brjod
pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas de dag gi ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas pa la rnam par spyod cing rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par brtse ba ji snyed cig yod pa de
dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub
sems dpa'i 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis thog ma dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /thog ma
sems bskyed pa'i smon lam dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas byung ba'i rgyan thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa
rnam pa tha dad pa rab tu shes so/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi yan lag gi tshogs rnam par dag par bya ba rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i lam la nan tan du bya ba'i
rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon pa'i tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon pa'i
shugs drag po rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa la bzod pa'i mthu dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub
sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon pas rnam par rtse ba dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon pa'i rnam par spyod pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems
dpa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su bsgom pa'i rgyud kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su sbyangs pa'i tshul dag
kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i mtshan ma dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub
sems dpa'i sa'i dbang dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa nas sar 'phar ba'i ye shes kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su bsdu ba'i ye shes dag kyang
rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su smin par bya ba'i ye shes kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba yang
rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgya yang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rnam par rtse ba dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems
dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems kyi skad
cig re re la ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho sna tshogs thob par byed pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snang ba'i tshul thob par byed pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyi glog gi snang ba'i sprin dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa thob pa'i tshul dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa'i ye
shes gyi rnam par gnon pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhing rgya mtshor rjes su 'gro bar byed pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /chos rgya mtsho la 'jug pa dag kyang
rab tu shes so/ /sems can rgya mtsho la 'jug pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /sems can rgya mtsho'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
spyod pa'i tshul thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /smon lam gyi tshul sna tshogs rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa sna
tshogs rgya mtsho rnam pa tha dad pa dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /rigs kyi bu kho mos ni ji ltar mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i bskal pa sna tshogs rgya
mtsho la zhugs te/ khong du chud pa de bzhin du phyi ma'i mtha' gcig nas gcig tu rgyud de/ rgyun mi 'chad pa'i ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /mi mjed kyi 'jig
rten gyi khams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa thams cad kyi bskal pa
rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho ji ltar shes pa
de bzhin du mi mjed gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu
shes so/ /mi mjed gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams ji ltar
shes pa de bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur mdab chags su gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /mi mjed
kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur mdab chags su gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gyi bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
phyogs bcur mdab chags su gnas pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa dag na gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /mi mjed kyi 'jig rten
gyi khams phyogs bcur mdab chags su gcig nas gcig tu rgyud par gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun tu
'od rnam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /phyogs kun tu 'od rnam par snang ba'i
'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun tu 'od rnam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi
khams kyi rgyud phyogs bcur mdab chags su gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa dag la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa rnams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang
rab tu shes so/ /phyogs kun tu 'od rnam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams gyi rgyud phyogs bcur mdab chags su gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa dag la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams rab tu shes pa de bzhin du gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'dir gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi
khams 'byam klas pa rnams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin du 'jig rten gyis khams tshul du bya ba rnams dang / de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
dkyil 'khor du bya ba rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang / 'jig rten kyi khams kyi bye brag rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chu klung rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi
khams kyi glong rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'khyil ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo dang /
'jig rten gyi khams sdong po dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rta babs dang / 'jig rten gyi ming du bya ba rnams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang
snying po me tog gis rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ 'di ji ltar shes par gyur pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/
nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa dag gi bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /rjes su dran no/ /sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dag la 'ang shes

shing / khong du chud do/ /sngon yongs su bsgrubs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag la 'ang shes shing khong du chud do/ /skal pa mtha' dang dbus med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag par bzhugs pa mdzad
pa dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /zhing yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i thabs kyi tshul dag kyang shes shing
khong du chud do/ /sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur mdzad cing gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sngon kyi de bzhin gshegs pa
la mchod cing rim gror mdzad pa'i sbyor ba'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi chos bstan pa yongs su bzung ba'i tshul dag kyang shes
shing khong du chud do/ /sngon byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin rab tu brnyes pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /yo byad la dbang bsgyur ba rab tu brnyes pa'i tshul dag kyang
shes shing khong du chud do/ /sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la nan tan du mdzad pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul
rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa mngon par bsgrub pa mdzad pa'i tshul dag
kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa brnyes pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus gyi shugs drag
brgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /bsam gtan gyi yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /
shes rab kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi skye gnas thams cad du sku'i gzugs brnyen
yongs su bstan pa mdzad pa'i thabs kyi tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par
mdzad pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /zhing rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su rgyas par mdzad pa dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las ye shes snang bar gyur pa rgya mtsho dag kyang khong du chud do/ /
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub yongs su gnas pa mdzad pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
shes snang ba rab tu brnyes pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs te thugs su chud pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud
do/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang rnam par rol
ba'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /'khor kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /'khor kyi dkyil 'khor de dag gi byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /thog ma'i smon lam gyi tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sems can
yongs su smin par byed pa dang / gdul ba'i thabs kyi tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/
sems can rgya mtsho yongs su smin par mdzad pa de dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /sems can de dag gi sems kyi skad cig re re'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba'i

thabs kyi tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rab tu thob pa'i tshul rgya mtsho
dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /spobs pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams
cad yongs su gnon pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /spyod pa'i dra ba mngon par bsgrubs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /
mthar gyis yongs su bsgrubs pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /de dag gi dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub gyi yan lag dang /
bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das
rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad du byung ba shes shing khong du chud do/ /mngon par bsgrub pa
de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho dang ye shes kyi sgyu ma'i dra ba mtha' yas pa la 'jug pa/
chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gengs pa/ sgo mtha' yas pa nas shin tu bstan par bya ba/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par gnas pa la 'jug pas bstan par
bya ba/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs par byung ba thams cad kyang ma 'dres par shes shing khong du chud
pa de mngon par bsgrub po/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam
par lta ba'i yul gyi yul ni de lta bu ste/ de'i phyir de la snyoms par zhugs na sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'i tshul rab tu shes so/ /sems can thams cad
kyi dge ba'i tshogs kyang rab tu shes so/ /sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i ye shes kyi tshul rnams kyang rab tu shes so/ /sems can
thams cad kyi las sna tshogs kyang rab tu shes so/ /nyan thos thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin sgo rnams kyang rab tu shes so/ /nyan thos thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin kyi sa yang rab tu
shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa zhi bas rnam par 'phrul pa yang shes shing khong du chud do/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i
tshul dag kyang rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa yang rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam
par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa yang rab tu shes so/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis shAkya'i bu mo go ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma khyod kyis byang chub
sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par lta ba'i yul 'di brnyes nas ji srid cig lags/ smras pa rigs kyi
bu sngon 'das pa'i dus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bskal pa 'das pa'i pha rol gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jigs pa byed pa zhes bya ba byung ste/
'jig rten gyi khams de'i bskal pa 'gro ba'i mchog ces bya bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de'i dbus su gling bzhi pa bde ba yod pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ gling bzhi pa
de'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus su rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal zhes bya ba grong rdal stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi'i phul du bya ba byung ba ste/ rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i
dpal de dang grong rdal stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi po de dag kyang so so nas sa'i gzhi bai DUR+Ya sngon po las grub pa la gnas pa/ rin po che bdun las byas pa'i ra bas kun nas bskor ba/
'obs spos chus yongs su gang ba gzhi gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/ ud pa la dang / pad mo dang / ku mu ta dang / me tog pun da ri ka shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam kha dog dang 'od kyi dra ba
sna tshogs shing dri shin tu zhim pas kun nas khyab pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ rin po che las byas pa'i stegs bu'i khri 'phang bdun las ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis
kun nas dgrigs pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing gi nags tshal gyi phreng ba dgrigs pas kun nas bskor ba ste/ steng nas gser gyi dra ba bres pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis
rnam par phye ba'i mig mangs ris mdzes par rnam par bres pas sa'i gzhi shin tu spa bar gyur pa/ dngos grub can gyi tshogs rnam par rgyu ba/ bya btsun pa'i khyus sgra skad
yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs snyan pa phyung ba/ bza' shing gi ra ba bye ba brgya stong gis mdzes par byas pa shin tu skyid cing phun sum tshogs par gnas pa skyes pa dang / bud med
brgya stong rab tu dga' bas gang ba/ ser bu bde zhing yid du 'ong bas bskyed de/ me tog gi char mang po rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu 'phrul ba/ sa'i bdag po dam pa brgya phrag
stong gi gnas su gyur pa dag ste/ grong rdal chen po de dag gi rin po che'i shing thams cad dang / gser gyi dra ba'i rgyan la stsogs pa rlung gis bskyod de/ rol mo mang po'i sgra dang
mnyam pa'i sgra skad byung ba dag las yid du 'ong ba'i tshig 'di skad 'byung ngo / /gsol cig mnobs shig chos la spyod cig /byang chub tu sems bskyed cig /phyir mi ldog
pa'i sa la mnga' thob par mdzod cig /khyed rnams bde bar gyur cig ces zer ro/ /rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal der rgyal po nor gyi bdag po zhes bya ba byung ste/
de la btsun mo'i 'khor bud med stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi yod do/ /blon po brgya phrag lnga yod par gyur te/ rgyal po nor gyi bdag po de la bu lnga brgya yod pa de thams cad
kyang dpa' bo rtul phod pa yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ gzhan gyi sde rab tu mjoms pa shin tu mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po'i mchog shin tu rgyas
pa dang ldan pa sha stag go/ /rgyal po nor gyi bdag po de'i btsun mo dam pa ni pad mo'i dpal dam pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba ste/ bud med stong phrag brgya bcu rtsa bzhi po de dag gi nang nas
gtso mor bya ba'o/ /de'i bu gzi brjid kyi dbang po zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba shin tu mdzes pa blta na sdug pa mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i
lus dang ldan pa zhig yod par gyur te/ de la mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag yod par gyur to/ /de 'ang 'di ltar rgyal po gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po de rkang
pa'i mthil shin tu gnas pa dang ldan te/ sa chen po la rkang pa'i mthil 'dor na mnyam par 'dor la/ 'deg na mnyam par 'deg ste/ gzhog na rkang pa'i mthil kun kyis
sa chen po la mnyam par reg go/ /de'i rkang pa'i mthil gnyis la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa/ lte ba dang bcas pa mu khyud dang bcas pa/ rnam pa thams cad du shin tu
tshang ba shin tu mdzes pa blta na sdug pa dag kyang byung bar gyur to/ /de'i rkang pa'i bol gnyis kyang shin tu rgyas par gyur to/ /rkang pa'i steng gi mdog shin tu gsal la/
shin tu mdzes te/ me tog dam pa bas kyang lhag par mdog bzang zhing gsal bar gyur te/ de'i rkang lag gi sor mo dra bar 'brel par gyur te/ shin tu mdzes
pa rnam par phye ba/ bu ga med pas zag pa med pa ni dper na ngang pa'i rgyal po gnas srung lta bur gyur to/ /de'i rkang pa'i rting pa yangs pa shin tu dag la shin tu gsal ba rin po che
thams cad kyi 'od rab tu 'gyed par grub pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /de'i sor mo rnams kyang ring zhing zlum la tshigs bar mnyam zhing yangs pa dang ldan par gyur te/ de dag mnyam
par sa la 'jog go/ /mnyam par sa las 'deg go/ /de'i rkang pa dang lag pa'i mthil yang ka tsa lin+di bas kyang lhag par reg na bde bar gyur te/ des skyes pa'am bud med
dam/ khye'u dang bu mo gang la reg kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad kyang bde ba dang / yid dga' ba'i dam pas tshim zhing yid shin tu bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i byin pa ri dgas e na
ya'i byin pa ltar 'dug par gyur te/ rim gyis gzhol ba dang / shin tu mdzes pa dang / legs par grub par gyur pas/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po e na ya ltar de la sus kyang
bsnyag pa 'am/ slebs par mi nus te/ 'gro bas ngal zhing dub par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid gyi dbang po de bdun shin tu mtho ba dang ldan par gyur te/
de'i rkang pa gnyis la shin tu mtho ba zlum la shin tu legs pa dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / tshigs mi snang ba dang / shin tu yid du 'ong ba dang / blta na sdug pa gnyis su
grub par gyur to/ /lag pa gnyis/ thal gong gi lhun gnyis/ ltag pa la gcig ste de ltar bdun no/ /de'i mtshan gsang ba'i sbubs na 'dug par grub par gyur te/
de'i gsang ba'i gnas sbubs na 'dug pa shin tu mi mngon la nang du nub cing kun nas yog par 'dug pa ste/ dper na glang po cang shes sam/ rta cang shes ltar 'dug pas
de gos ma gyon par 'dug kyang bud med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ rgan pa 'am/ dar la bab pa 'am/ bla ma 'am/ bla mar bya ba rnams kyis
kyang mi mthong ste/ gzhan du na bdag longs spyod pa 'am/ tshad du bstan par byas te/ 'dod pas spyad pa ni ma gtogs so/ /rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid gyi bdag po de
ro stod seng ge ltar 'dug pa dang ldan par gyur te/ lus rim pas rgyas la ro stod shin tu yangs shing rdzogs pas ri dgas kyi rgyal po bas kyang mdzes par dbyibs shin
tu legs pa'i ro stod dang ldan par gyur to/ /de'i thal gong rgyas shing lus shin tu rgyas pa lus rnam par phye ba/ lus kyi cha thams cad rkyen du 'bab par mnyam pa/
lus la dma' ba med pa/ lus la mtho ba med pa/ lus la zhum pa med pa/ lus la dgu ba med pa/ lus rin po che'i gtan pa shin tu phyis pa bas kyang lhag
par gsal bar gyur to/ /de'i dpung mgo shin tu zlum zhing sha rgyas la shin tu mdzes par gang ba dang ldan par gyur to/ /des mi chen po'i mtshan lag pa shin tu
ring ba thob par gyur pa des lus ma btud te/ lus drang por 'dug kyang pus mo'i lha nga gnyis la nyug cing reg go/ /des mi chen po'i mtshan lus che zhing drang ba
'ang thob par gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad du mchog tu gyur pa dang ldan la lus tshul dang 'dra bar mnyam pa dang / lus rab tu gnyen pa dang / lus shin tu lji ba dang / lus rab
tu gsal ba dang / lus shin tu sim par byed pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /des mi chen po'i mtshan mgul dung lta bu yang thob par gyur te/ mi dma' ba'i mgul dang / de'i
mgul gyi 'khor thams cad dang / bzhin gyi 'khor thams cad na rtsa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang shin tu mnyam par gyur te/ kun kyang rab tu tshang bar gyur to/ /
mi chen po'i mtshan seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu yang thob par gyur te/ za 'gram shin tu 'khregs pa dang / bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu rgyas pa dang / bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor shin
tu legs shing yongs su dag pa dang / kha'i sgo shin tu yangs pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /mi chen po'i mtshan so mnyam pa bzhi bcu dang yang ldan par gyur te/ so ma tshang ba med
la zas shig za na yang lan gcig ldang bas chung ngu na 'bras chan gyi 'bru 'ga' yang ma zhib par za ba med do/ /so thags bzang zhing mnyam pa rab tu thob ste/ mtshams
chu sgo med pa dang / shin tu mnyam pa dang / rkyen tu shin tu mdzes pa ste/ de kha zas shig za na yang 'gro ba dang 'chags pa dang / zhen pa dang / ljan ljin du 'gyur ba 'am/ thogs par 'gyur
ba 'am/ gseb 'gang bar 'gyur ba medo/ /mi chen po'i mtshan so mnyam pa rab tu thob par gyur te/ so mnyam zhing rda rdo med pa dang / so lhag med pa dang / so zhum pa med pa dang / so gyes pa med pa
dang / so thog drung mnyam pa dang / so rdo ba med par gyur to/ /gzhon nu de'i mche ba shin tu dkar bar gyur te/ mche ba skyon med pa/ mche ba shin tu gsal ba/ mche ba shin tu dag pa/ mche ba shin tu
brtan par gyur to/ /mi chen po'i mtshan lce shin tu yangs pa yang rab tu thob par gyur te/ de'i lce ni shin tu yangs la srab cing mnyen te/ shin tu 'jam pa dang / las su rung ba dang / yid du 'ong
ba dang bsgyur na bde ba dang / gdong gi dkyil 'khor kun tu 'gebs pa dang / bden zhing phan par 'gyur ba'i don dang / yi ge dang ngag dang nges pa'i tshig thogs pa med par brjod par gyur to/ /

gzhon nu de tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par gyur te/ dbyangs yid du 'ong ba dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / glu'i nga ro dang / sil snyan kyi dbyangs dang / sgra skad dang brjod cing smra ba'i tshig gi las
yid du 'ong ba brjod pas ngag gi las mngon par dga' ba skyed pa/ 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'dun par 'gyur bar tshangs pa las kyang lhag pa'i dbyangs kyi ngag brjod de/ 'khor gyi

dkyil 'khor las kyang gud du mi 'da' bar thams cad kyi yid dang 'thun par byed pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /gzhon nu de ni mig dkar nag 'byes par gyur te/ mig shin tu dang ba dang / mig yongasu dag pa dang /

mig la 'od chags pa dang / mig rnam par gsal ba dang / mig mngon par mdzes pa dang / mig blta na sdug pa dang / mig yid du 'ong ba dang / mig 'dzum pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /gzhon nu de ni rdzi ma ba'i rdzi ma lta bu dang ldan par gyur
te/ mig gi skye mched rin po che pad+ma ra ga ltar shin tu dag pa/ mig gi sprin mnyam pa/ mig gi sprin mtshungs pa/ mig gi sprin legs pa/ mig gi sprin yangs pa/ mig gi sprin rdzogs pa/ mig gi sprin
shin tu brtan par gyur to/ /de'i smyin mtshams su mdzod spu skyes par gyur te/ 'jam pa las su rung ba/ shin du mnyen pa/ shing bal ltar reg na bde ba dang / dang ba/ gsal ba 'od yod pa/
chab brom lta bu kha ba'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa/ 'od zer dkar po'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od rab tu snang ba dang ldan par gyur te/ de'i spyi bo la gtsug tor mngon par grub par gyur te/ shin tu
legs pa/ kun nas zlum pa dang / dbus su bab pa/ skra'i rgyan du gyur pa/ rin po che'i pad mo mdab ma bye ba brgya phrag stong dang ldan pa ltar snang ba/ kun nas cha mnyam par gnas pa/
rin thang gdab du med pas gtses pa'i gtsug tu gyur pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /gzhon nu de ni pags pa shin tu 'jam pa dang ldan par gyur te/ de'i lus la rdul lam/ dri ma 'am/ rngul
lam/ ser ga 'am/ gnyer ma'am/ lhod pa 'am/ 'khums pa 'am/ 'phyung ba 'am/ slong bag tu gnas pa med par gyur to/ /gzhon nu de ni mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang
ldan par gyur to/ /'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi mdog lta bu dang ldan zhing 'od kun tu 'dom gang ba dang / gser ltar gcig tu 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis mdzes par brgyan
pa dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas dri zhim po'i 'od zer 'byung bas lus kyi rgyan rab rib med cing 'od gsal ba dang ldan par gyur to/ /gzhon nu de ni ba spu re rer byung ba dang ldan par
gyur te/ ba spu'i bu ga re re nas ba spu re re skyes par gyur pa/ bai DUR+Ya sngon po'i kha dog lta bu g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa/ legs par skyes pa/ mthang la zha bar 'dug pa shin tu legs
par gnas pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /gzhon nu de'i spu yan lag gyen du 'khyil bar gyur te/ phyir mi zlogs pa'i spu dang / mi ldog pa'i spu dang / ma 'dres pa'i spu dang ldan par gyur
to/ /gzhon nu de mi chen po'i mtshan skra mthon ting du 'dug pa thob par gyur te/ de'i skra nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i mdog ltar mthon ting du 'dug pa/ 'jam pa snum pa/ legs
par 'khyil pa/ g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa/ drung shin tu ran pa/ zang zing med pa/ 'jam 'jam ltar 'dug pa/ mi 'dzing pa/ dbyibs mnyam zhing 'thun par gnas pa dang ldan

par gyur to/ /rgyal bu gzhon nu de shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa'i mi chen po'i mtshan rab tu thob par gyur te/ kun nas rkyen du ran pa dang / kun tu bzang ba dang / kun tu mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur te/

de ni mdun nas bltas na'ang ngoms mi shes shing blta na yid du 'ong ba rgyab dang g.yas g.yon dang / 'gro ba dang 'dug pa dang 'greng ba dang nyal ba dang / smra ba dang / mi smra bar 'dug pa la bltas na/ yang
ngoms mi shes shing yid du 'ong la blta na sdug par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu rgyal po gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po de mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis yongs su brgyan pa'i
lus dang ldan par gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyis blta na yid du mi 'ong ba'i bag med blta na bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ blta na sems can thams cad kyi dga'
ba yongs su 'byung ba dang / de lta bu zhig skyes par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu de nas lan gcig rgyal po gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po de yab kyis gnang nas rgyal po'i gnas sdong po'i ri bo'i

dpal gyi bza' shing gi ra ba spos kyi myu gu'i rtse mo las 'od kyi sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba der sa bzang po lta ba'i phyir bu mo stong phrag nyi shu dang lhan gcig tu bsod nams kyi gzi brjid dang dpal gyi

bskal pa bzang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan gyis byung nas skyes pa dang / bud myed kyi tshogs kyis kun nas dga' bar bya zhing / 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi shing rta rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo chen po

bzhi dang ldan pa/ rdo rje mthu bo che'i srog shing gi rtsa ba can tsan dan dam pa las grub pa'i yu ba bzang po dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po spos sna tshogs kyi shing thags rnam par bkye ba/ rin po che thams

cad kyi me tog sna tshogs kyis rab tu mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yogs pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ seng ge'i khri rin po che dam pa'i dra ba'i rgyan gyi snying po can dbus
su bshams pa/ bu mo lnga brgyas rin po che'i srad bu'i lda ldi nas yongs su gzung ba/ nam mkha' la chags pa myed pa'i rlung ltar mgyogs pa'i rta cang shes stong dang bcas pa la zhon nas
gdugs chen po rim gyis gzhol zhing blta na sdug pa/ steng yogs rin po che'i rgyal po bai DUr+ya dkar po las byas pa/ 'od dri ma myed pa tshad med pa 'byung ba/ rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa rmad

du byung ba sna tshogs thams cad kyis spa bar spras te/ rnam pa thams cad du mdzes par brgyan pa/ yu ba rin po che'i rgyal po bai DUr+ya sngon po las bsgreng bas ni bskyabs/ srog chags brgya stong mang pos

ni yongs su bskor/ rol mo brgya stong mang po lha rdzas kyi dbyangs yid du 'ong ba snyan pa dang ldan pa dag ni rab tu blangs/ me tog gi char chen po ni mngon par bab/ lha rdzas kyi spos dri zhim pa'i bdug spos kyi snod

bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis ni rab tu bdug cing 'gro bar gyur to/ /de de ltar 'gro ba'i tshe lam yang rgyud brgyad dang ldan par gyur te/ mthon dman myed pa dang / gseg ma dang gyo mo myed pa dang / gser dngul dang

rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs kyi khams kyis sa'i gzhi rab tu sgrubs pa dang / gser gyi bye ma bkram pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog sil mas chal bar gang ba dang / g.yas g.yon nas rin po

che'i shing gi phreng bas dkrigs pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha ran bkye ba dang / steng nas rin po che'i dril bu dra ba bres pa dang / rin po che'i gnas la sna tshogs kyis bkab pa dang / rin po che'i
rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / snam bu brgya stong rab tu brgyan pa du ma bsgreng zhing spyangs pas mdzes par brgyan pa dang / g.yas g.yon nas rin po che'i stegs bu'i phreng ba rnam par bkod
pas rnam par brgyan pa ste/ rin po che'i stegs bu la la la ni slongs mo ba'i tshogs la yongs su stabs pa'i don du rin po che'i snod sna tshogs/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ba
bkod/ stegs bu la la la ni rgyan 'dod pa'i slongs mo ba rnams brgyan pa'i don du rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi rnam pa yongs su bkod/ stegs bu la la la ni sems can thams
cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bkod/ stegs bu la la la ni su ci 'dod pa de dag la de sbyin pa'i don du kha zas dang btung ba dang / bro ba sna

tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ba'i snod mang po bkod/ stegs bu la la la ni rnam pa thams cad du mchog tu zhim pa'i ro dang / kha dog dang dri dang / bro dang / reg yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa'i lha rdzas kyi kha
zas kyi rnam pa bkod/ stegs bu la la la ni ro bro ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha rdzas kyi shing tog sna tshogs thams cad spungs/ stegs bu la la la ni gos 'dod pa rnams yid bzhin du spyod du

gzung ba'i phyir lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa mdog bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang ri mo sna tshogs shin tu spa bar rnam par phye ba shin tu btsun pa la 'os pa shin tu
phra ba/ rab tu 'jam pa/ thags su ma btags pa/ bye ba brgya phrag stong snyed yongs su bkod par gyur to/ /stegs bu la la la ni byug pa 'dod pa'i sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba
bzhin du yongs su spyod du gzung ba'i phyir/ lha rdzas kyi spos kyi rnam pa kha dog dang / dri rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad dang ldan pa dag kyang bkod par gyur to/ /stegs bu la la la ni sems can
rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su spyod du gzung ba'i phyir yo byad thams cad kyi phung po dag kyang bkod par gyur to/ /stegs bu la la la ni na chung gzugs bzang ba rab tu mdzes pa shin tu
sdug pa/ cha lugs sdugu sna tshogs dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba'i gos sna tshogs gyon pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis mdzes par brgyan pa/ byug pa sna tshogs kyis tshul sdug gur brgyan cing
mdzes par byas pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ bud myed kyi bzo dang sgyu dang / bshes gnyen gyi tshul la mkhas pa dag kyang bkod par gyur to/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal de nyid na sbrul

'tshong ma'i dam pa rgyal po'i longs spyod du 'os pa/ blta na mdzes pa zhes bya ba zhig yod pa/ de'i bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing shin tu mdzes pa/ blta na

sdug pa ha cang yang mi ring ha cang yang mi thung / ha cang yang mi sbom/ ha cang yang mi phra/ ha cang yang mi dkar/ ha cang yang mi sngo ba/ skra mthon ting du 'dug pa/ myig dkar nag 'byes pa/ bzhin
yid du 'ong ba/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/ 'jam zhing snyan par smra ba/ shes rab dang ldan pa/ bshes gnyen gyi tshul thams cad la mkhas pa gtsug lag thams cad la shes pa/ brtson
pa le lo myed pa/ rim 'gro yod pa/ mos pa dang ldan pa/ byams pa'i sems 'dogs pa/ khong khro ba myi mnga' ba/ blta na mi ngoms shing yid du 'ong ba/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug

chung ba/ ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa/ drang zhing mnyen pa/ g.yo dang sgyu med pa zhig yod de/ de dang lhan gcig tu bu mo du ma zhig gis yongasu bskor te/ rin po che'i shing rta la zhon nas rgyal
po'i gnas sdong po'i ri bo'i dpal nas byung ste/ rgyal pos bka' bstsal nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i mdun nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de glu len zhing 'dong 'dong ba
las/ rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po mthong nas/ 'dod chags kyi sems shin tu mi bzed pa zhig g.yos te/ rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po shin tu yid du 'ong ches
nas rjes su 'brang zhing sems la rang dbang med pas/ blta na sdug pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ma 'di ltar mkhyen par mdzod gcig /gal te bdag rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag
po la ma gtang na ni 'gum pa'am/ srog la 'bab pa'i sdug bsngal gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ bu mo de lta bu'i sems ma bskyed gcig /gzhon nu 'di ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
mtshan dang ldan pa ste/ de'i yab nor gyi bdag po mi bzhugs par gyur na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid la gnas par 'gyur ba'i gnas yod do/ /de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur bas/
de'i bud med rin po che nam mkha' las 'gro ba 'byung bar 'gyur la/ bu mo bdag cag kyang / smad 'tshong ma dag gcig ste/ 'jig rten thams cad dga' bar byed pa yin gyi/ yu bus sems can 'ga'
zhig la nam mtsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur myi byar myi rung ba'ang myed de/ yu bu ni rgyal po nor gyi bdag po'i bkas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i rim 'gror 'dod 'dod par zad kyis de
lta bu'i sems brtan par ma byed gcig /gnas de ni thob par yang shin tu dka'o/ /de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sku nyi ma dam pa
zhes bya ba mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa bla na myed pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i snying po byang chub chos kyi sprin shin tu sdug pa'i 'od ces bya ba yang bza' shing gi ra ba spos kyi myu gu'i rtse mo las 'od kyi sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba
de'i nang du byung ste/ der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa thog mar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ zhag bdun lon pa de bu mo de shing rta la zhon bzhin du yur zhing

'chog 'chog pa'i rmyi lam du mthong nas sad par gyur pa dang / sngon gnyen bshes su gyur pa'i lha mo zhig gis bstan pa/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nyi ma dam pa de ni snying po byang chub chos kyi sprin shin

tu sdug pa'i 'od ces bya ba na rnam par spyod cing thog ma mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas zhag bdun lon te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin

dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto phye chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gyi lha'i tshogs kyis mdun du byas shing bzhugs ste/ der sa'i lha mo

thams cad kyang kun nas 'dus/ chu'i lha mo dang / mye'i lha mo dang / rlung gi lha mo dang / rgya mtsho'i lha mo dang / chu klung gi lha mo dang / ri'i lha mo dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dang / skya rengs 'char ba'i lha mo dang /

nags tshal gyi lha mo dang / shing gi lha mo dang / sman gyi lha mo dang / lo thog gi lha mo dang / grong khyer gyi lha mo dang / rkang gis 'gro ba'i lha mo dang / snying po byang chub kyi lha mo dang / lus kyi 'od gzer gyi

lha mo dang / sems can gyi ris kyi lha mo dang / nam mkha'i lha mo dang / phyogs thams cad kyi lha mo dag kyang bcom ldan 'das sku nyi ma dam pa'i zhal blta ba'i phyir kun nas 'dus so zhes nas/ de ltar
des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thos pas bag tsha myed par gyur te/ skabs su bab nas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i mdun du de'i tshe tshigs
su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gzugs kyi mchog gis 'jig rten khyad par 'phags/ /yon tan rnams kyis thams cad phyogs su grags/ /shes rab stobs kyis bdag dang 'dra
ma mchis/ /sgyu rtsal dga' ba sgyu ma'i tshul kun 'tshal/ /srog chags mang po stong phrag du ma yis/ /'dod chags dbang gis bdag la rab bltas kyang / /gzhon nu bdag ni 'jig rten gang la yang / /
glo ba chags par gyur pa gcig ma mchis/ /sems can gang la yang zhen par gyur pa 'am/ /gang la 'ang khong khror bdag gi sems ma gyur/ /gang la 'ang dgra myi bgyid de zhe myi sdang / /bdag ni
sems can sman par dga' ba lags/ /sku gzhan sku mchog yon tan rab mnga' khyod/ /gang tshe bdag gis gsal bar mthong gyur pa/ /de tshe dbang po kun kyang nyams su bde/ /rgya che yangs
par shin tu dga' bar gyur/ /khyod kyi dbu bzang lcang lo 'khril ba na/ /rin chen rnam snang mdog tu mthon ting gsal/ /zhal gyi smin sdug 'phral ba shangs su mdzes/ /khyod kyi zhal sngar lus bde
bdag 'bul lo/ /mtshan gyi rab 'chang gzi brjid che mnga' ba/ /sku gzugs gser gyi ri bo bzang po 'dra/ /khyod kyi spyan sngar bdag lta mi mdzes te/ /zil du rlag pas snag tsha'i gzugs
kyang 'dra/ /spyan gsal rang la dkar nag 'byes pas mdzes/ /shin tu zhal rgyas seng ge'i za 'gram can/ /khyod kyi gsung ni thogs pa ma mchis na/ /gsung mchog mnga' bas bdag ni
gzung du gsol/ /khyod kyi zhal ni ljags yangs mnga' ba na/ /mdog dmar yangs pa rin chen mchog gi 'od/ /tshangs dbyangs yan lag mchog gi gsung mnga' bas/ /gsung zhing
'gro ba rab tu dga' ba mdzad/ /khyod kyi zhal ni thags bzang tshems mnga' ba/ /dung ltar dri med shin tu rnam par gsal/ /'dzum zhing bzhad pa rnam par ston mdzad kyang / /skyes bu dpal
khyod 'gro ba dga' bar mdzad/ /khyod kyi sku la mtshan rab mdzes pa rnams/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis dag cing 'od kyang gsal/ /sku gzugs bzang po yongs su des brgyan pas/ /mi'i dbang po 'khor los
sgyur ba byon de nas rgyal bu gzi brjid kyi bdag pos/ bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo khyod su'i khyod la yongs su srung ba ni gang zhig yod/
bu mo nga la ni gzhan gyis yongs su gzung ba'i bud med bdag gir byar mi rung ngo zhes nas/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/ /blta sdug gzugs kyi yon tan legs ldan
pa/ /mtshan bzang bsod nams rnam par dag pa'i lus/ /khyod la dri ba'i don 'di nga la smros/ /lus mchog khyod ni su yis yongs su bzung / /khyod la pha dang ma ni yod dam myed/ /khyim thab
myed dam khyod ni su zhig dbang / /gzugs mdzes khyod la sems can gzhan nam gcig /bdag gi yin par 'du shes byed myed dam/ /khyod kyi yid ni gsod la myi dga' grang / /gzhan
las ma byin phrogs par mi byed dam/ /'dod pas log par g.yem la myi dga' grang / /brdzun du brjod smrar yid ni mi mos sam/ /khyod kyi blo gros mdza' 'byed mi 'jug gam/ /tshig rlang
gzhan la gnod par myi smra grang / /gzhan gyi nor la chags par sems myed dam/ /'gro ba rnams la gnod par mi sems grang / /blta ba'i 'brog dgon lam du ma zhugs grangs/ /las kyi rgyud
la yi dam sems myed dam/ /g.yo mdog sgyu'i dbang du mi 'gro 'am/ /mi 'thad 'jig rten gnod par mi byed grang / /pha ma gnyen dang mdza' bshes bla ma la/ /sri zhu rim gror bya ba'i tshul 'chang
ngam/ /phongs par gyur pa yongs su bsdu don du/ /khyed kyi yid la byin par sems yod dam/ /chos dang 'thun par dus su 'doms byed cing / /lus dang sems yid yongs su dag byed la/ /
yang dag las su rung ba bskyed byed pa'i/ /dge bshes rnams la dga' bar sems yod dam/ /sangs rgyas rnams la rim gror byed ldan nam/ /sangs rgyas sras la dga' mchog yod dam myed/ /
gang las bde gshegs sras rnams skyer 'gyur ba'i/ /chos kyi dam pa de ni shes mi shes/ /chos yid mchog la gnas par khyod byed grang / /chos min spyad pa'i blo gros med grang de/ /legs
pa mtha' yas yon tan rgya mtsho la/ /gus pa'i sri zhu dga' sems mchog yod dam/ /skye bo mgon med phongs par gyur pa yi/ /'dren pa rnams la byams pa'i yid yod dam/ /der song 'gro ba'i
lam la zhugs pa yi/ /shin tu nyams thag snying rje sems grang ngo / /gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa mthong gyur na/ /khyod ni dga' ba mchog dang ldan 'gyur ram/ /skye bo nyon mongs rnams kyis
'khol gyur la/ /shes rab mthu bskyed btang snyoms byed mi byed/ /myi shes gnyid log skye bo mang mthong na/ /byang chub dam par smon lam 'debs byed grang / /bskal pa mtha' yas spyad pa spyod
byed na/ /smon lam dam pas skyo bar mi 'gyur grang / /de nas bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa ma smad 'tshong ma'i gtso ma blta na sdug pas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi
bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu bdag gi bu mo 'di ni rdzus te byung ba/ pad mo'i nang nas skyes pa ste/ sngan chad khyim gyi nang nas phyi rol tu ma byung ngo zhes nas/ de'i tshe tshigs
su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bu mo 'di la khyod kyis gang smras pa/ /de ni bdag gis khyod la rim par brjod/ /ji ltar bu mo 'di skyes bskyed bskyed pa/ /bdag gis khyod la gsol gyis gsan du gsol/ /

gang tshe dgung sangs khyod ni bltam gyur pa/ /de tshe bdag gi bu mo 'di skyes te/ /rdzus te dri med pad ma'i sbubs nas byung / /yan lag kun tshang myig yangs 'di yang skyes/ /dus kyi nang na sos ka dus
mchog la/ /sman dang lo thog myu gu 'thon pa'i tshe/ /stsa la'i ra ba bza' shing rab mchog tu/ /bdag ni rtse dga' de khrod mchi mchi ste/ /sna tshogs yal ga'i lo ma rgyas gyur cing / /zhugs
shing me tog sdug rgyas sprin gyi mdog /bya bran sna tshogs sgra snyan zhugs shing nang / /nags khrod mya ngam ma mchis dgar mchis mchis/ /rgyan dang ldan zhing shin tu yid 'ong la/ /rin
chen rang ba sna tshogs 'tshal pa rnams/ /rol mo glu la shin tu bslabs pa yi/ /bu mo brgya phrag brgyad dang bdag kyang ldan/ /spos mchog ldan pa'i pun da ri ka dang / /rdzing 'gram me
tog sil mas bltams pa yi/ /sa phyogs de na bud myed mang po dang / /bdag cag de na dga' bar mchis mchis na/ /chab dbus de nas rin chen pad mo'i mchog /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa
byung bar gyur/ /lo ma rin chen yu ba bai DUr+ya/ /snying po 'dzam bu chu klung gser las bgyis/ /spos mchog rin chen dam pa'i ze ba can/ /'od chen 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan kun tu 'phro/ /
de tshe dgung la gdugs shig shar tam zhes/ /skye bo kun kyang yid gnyis 'tshal bar gyur/ /dgung sangs gyur nas pad mo chen po de/ /gdugs kyi 'od kyis rab tu rgyas bgyis nas/ /
snang ba de dang sgra snyan rab kyang bkye/ /'di 'byung de ni sngon gyi ltas su byung / /bud myed rin chen 'di 'dra 'jig rten du/ /tshul khrims dam pa rnam par dag pas byung / /sug las
bgyis pa chab 'tshal mi 'gyur bas/ /'di ni sngon cad legs par spyad pa'i 'bras/ /skra ni mthon ting mig yangs ud pa la/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan kha dog rnam dag ldan/ /phreng ba rgyan mchog
cha lugs dbyibs su shis/ /dpal ltar dri myed pad mo'i mchog las skyes/ /lus ni rnam dag yan lag rgyan du mnyam/ /lus kyi dbyibs legs yan lag yongs su tshang / /gser gyi
gzugs la nor bus spras pa 'dra/ /phyogs kun 'od kyis rnam par gdong bar gsal/ /lus las tsan dan rgyal po'i spos kyi dri/ /phyogs su rgyas par 'di'i lus las 'byung / /sgra snyan
lha rdzas yid du 'ong brjod tshe/ /kha nas ud pa la'i ngad kyis ldang / /'di ni gang tshe 'dzum zhing rgod pa'i tshe/ /rol mo'i sgra snyan de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bud med rin chen 'jig rten 'dir
byung ste/ /tha mal kun gyi dbang du gyur ma lags/ /khyod ma gtogs par mi'i 'jig rten na/ /'di'i bdag po gzhan ni gcig ma mchis/ /mtshan rab brgyan pa'i sku gzugs mdzes mnga'
ba/ /khyod kyi zhal sngar bu mo 'di bzhes gsol/ /'di ni ha cang mi ring mi thung ste/ /ha cang mi sbom ha cang mi phra lags/ /lto ni gzhu 'dra nu ma shas kyang rgyas/ /yan lag skyon bral 'di ni
khyod la 'os/ /grangs dang yi ge shes bgyi tshul rnams dang / /lag brda'i tshul dang gtsug lag tshul la mkhas/ /'jig rten kun na bzo rnams ji snyed pa/ /ma lus de la 'di ni pha rol phyin/ /
mda' gzhu'i tshul la'ang rnam pa rgyus su mkhas/ /'phong gi cho ga rnam par nges par rtogs/ /dgra yid gzhung zhing dbab pa kun la yang / /'di ni mchog tu pha rol phyin par gyur/ /lus rnams kun
la rin chen rnam dag pa'i/ /'od mchog 'khor gyis shin tu mdzes pa ste/ /sngon bgyis legs pas shin tu sdug par brgyan/ /'di ni khyod kyi phyag rjed khyod la 'os/ /mi'i 'jig rten gnas
rnams ji snyed pa/ /de dag gso ba'i tshul gyi cho ga 'tshal/ /de dag ma lus thams cad zhir bgyi na'ang / /ma nor sman gyi tshogs gso ba la mkhas/ /'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan skad rnams thams

cad dang / /skye bo'i nges tshig ma lus bye brag dang / /'jig rten tha snyad brjod pa'i mtshams sbyar ba/ /sna tshogs kun la'ang 'di ni pha rol phyin/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag mngon par sgrub pa'i tshul/ /
de dag bye brag tshul la'ang rab tu zhugs/ /'jig rten glu gar rnam pa ji snyed pa/ /ma lus de rnams kun gyi tshul la'ang 'tshal/ /rol mo sil snyan dag gi thabs rnams dang / /bzhad gad
rol mo'i tshul la rnam par mkhas/ /chags dang ma chags mi rnams mngon 'tshal kyang / /khong khro chags par 'gyur ba ma mchis so/ /'jig rten bud med sgra rnams ji snyed pa/ /khyad par
nang du de la ma lus 'tshal/ /bud myed skye bo'i skyon du bgyi ba rnams/ /grangs med de dag 'di la gcig ma mchis/ /thil gyis blta dang zur gyis blta ba dang / /yan lag stabs dang yan lag
rnams bstan dang / /bshes gnyen kun la mkhas pa'i mthar phyin te/ /khyod kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid/ /'di ni phrag dog ser sna ma mchis te/ /'dod pa zheng du mi sdang sdig mi
bgyid/ /bzod cing drang la mnyen zhing nges pa ste/ /mi khro mi brlang shin tu mkhas pa lags/ /ldang ba'i dang tshul yid du 'ong ba'i ngag /rtag tu bla ma'i thugs dang sbyor ba ste/ /sku nyams gar

bde lta zhing srid zhu che/ /khyod kyi spyod 'thun rjes snyegs tshul dang 'thun/ /rgas shing gtugs dang nad dang ldan pa dang / /phongs pa shin tu sdug bsngal gyur pa dang / /myig dang bral zhing mgon skyabs
ma mchis la/ /'di ni snying brtse rtag tu bskyed pa lags/ /'di ni rtag tu gzhan don sems la brtson/ /bdag la sman pa sems par bgyid ma mchis/ /'jig rten kun la sman par dga'
ba ste/ /rlabs chen sems kyi yon tan kun gyis brgyan/ /mchis sam nyal lam mche 'am 'greng yang rung / /smra 'am mi smra 'dzum zhing rgod kyang rung / /rtag tu bag mchis dran pa
shes bzhin te/ /'di ni 'jig rten kun gyis rtag tu bsngags/ /bsod nams ldan pas kun tu rnam par snang / /'gro ba kun kyang rtag tu dga' ba ste/ /'di la lta bas 'jig rten
ngoms myi 'gyur/ /'di ni gang la 'ang chags par ma mchis lags/ /dge bshes rnams la srid zhu 'di che ste/ /de dag mthong bar rtag par rab tu dga'/ /rjes su ci 'byung lta zhing
skyon med tshul/ /sems ni rtag tu bstan pa ri dang 'dra/ /'di ni bsod nams mchog gis rtag tu brgyan/ /mi mdza' dgrar len 'di la yong ma mchis/ /'di'i shes 'dra bud myed gcig

ma mchis/ /rgyal sras khyod la 'di ni tshul dang 'thun// //sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dgu pa/ de nas rgyal bu gzi brjid kyi bdag po bza' shing gi ra ba spos kyi myu gu'i rtse mo las 'od

kyi sprin 'byung bar phyin te/ bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa'i ma smad 'tshong ma'i gtso mo blta na sdug pa'i mdun du/ bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa la 'di skad ces
smras so/ /bu mo nga ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa yin te/ de bas na ngas thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshogs ni tshad myed pa zhig bstsags par bya dgos/ bskal
pa mtha' dang dbus myed pa zhig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod de/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad ni yongs su rdzogs par bya dgos/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par ni de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par bya dgos te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa ni yongs su gzung bar bya/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ni yongs su sbyang bar bya/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs ni mi gcad par bya/ sems can gyi rgyud thams cad ni yongs su smyin par bya/ sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ni rnam par bzlog
par bya/ mtha' las rgal bar bde bar la ni sems can rab tu dgod par bya/ sems can thams cad kyi ye shes kyi myig ni yongs su dag par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sgrub
pa la ni brtson par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la ni gnas par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sa ni yongs su sgrub par bya/ sems can gyi khams thams cad ni
yongs su sbyang bar bya/ sems can thams cad kyi phongs pa yongs su gcad pa'i phyir bdag gi nor thams cad ni gtang bar bya/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
la spyod pa'i tshe/ kha zas dang ni sems can yongs su tshim par bya/ yo byad kyi dngos po thams cad yongs su gtang bas ni slong ba'i tshogs thams cad yongs su tshim par bya dgos te/ de ltar

bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba la nan tan nyams su len pa'i tshe/ phyi nang gi dngos po gang ci 'ang rung ste/ yongs su mi gtang ba de lta bu med pas de ltar ngas bu dang bu mo dang / chung ma yang sbyin par
bya dgos/ myig dang mgo dang rkang lag dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su gtang dgos na/ de'i tshe khyod gzhan byin na/ nga'i sbyin pa'i bgegs su 'gyur ro/ /bu yid du 'ong ba yongs
su gtang na yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /lus dang sems kyi sdug bsngal yang mang po zhig nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /nga la bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar byas na ser sna'i sems su
'gyur ro/ /nga'i yan lag dang nying lag gtubs shing slongs mo ba rnams la gtong ba'i tshe/ yid mi dga' bar yang 'gyur ro/ /nam zhig na ngas khyod bor te de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa
la rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dus kyang yod de/ de'i tshe'ang khyod yid myi dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes nas rgyal bu gzi brjid kyi bdag pos de'i tshe/ bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal
shin tu sbyangs pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ngas ni 'gro kun snying rje rab bskyed de/ /yun ring mchog nas byang chub rab zhugs pas/ /yang dag byang chub tshogs chen rgya mtsho rnams/ /
tshad med thams cad yongs su rdzogs bya dgos/ /bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus myed par/ /mkha' ltar tshad myed smon lam rnam sbyangs shing / /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i sa yi
rnams bskal pa mtha' yas yongs su sbyang yang dgos/ /rgyal ba dus gsum 'byung ba thams cad kyi/ /pha rol phyin pa'i lam la ngas bslabs te/ /ye shes bla na med pa'i tshul chen gyis/ /byang chub
lam mchog rnam par sbyang yang dgos/ /phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing rnams thams cad kyang / /kun nas nyon mongs rnam par sbyang bar bya/ /'jig rten kun gyi mi khom thams cad dang / /ngan song kun
kyang rnam par bzlog dgos so/ /nyon mongs sgribs shing gti mug mun 'thoms pa'i/ /sems can kun kyang ma lus rnam sbyang dgos/ /sna tshogs thabs kyis yongs su sbyang byas te/ /
thams cad mkhyen gyi tshul la dgod kyang dgos/ /chags med sa rnams kun kyang ngas sbyangs te/ /bskal pa rgya mtshor rgyal ba mchod par bya/ /'gro ba ma lus kun la byams bskyed de/ /
'jig rten dag tu ma lus sbyin gtang dgos/ /slong ba kun nas 'dus shing 'ongs mthong nas/ /thams cad gtang bar rtag tu brtson gyur na/ /de tshe khyod ni nga sems mi 'thun te/ /zhum zhing dma' la
'jungs par mi 'gyur ram/ /nga'i mgo 'dod 'ongs pa ngas mthong ste/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod gyur na/ /de tshe khyod ni sdug bsngal gdungs gyur gyis/ /'di 'dra'i don thos rab
tu bstan par gyis/ /nga'i rkang lag gtubs pa mthong gyur na/ /khyod ni mi dga' de tshe slong ba la/ /bud myed rang gis tshig drag mi bzod smra/ /don 'di thos shing sems la yongs su soms/ /
'phags pa'i dngos dang de bzhin bu rnams dang / /khyod kyang slong ba'i tshogs la sbyin dgos kyis/ /don 'di thos te mi dga' myed na lta/ /khyod dga' thams cad de bzhin bya la rag /de skad ces
smras pa dang / bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pas/ rgyal bu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu ji skad gsungs pa de ltar bgyi'o/ /bdag ni khyod

ci dgyes pa dang / ci bzhed par longs spyod pa dang / gang du dgyes par mchi ba dang / thams cad du yang slad na ma lus par rjes su 'brang ba dang / rtag tu zham ring slebs pa dang / don thams cad la brtson

pa dang / thugs dang 'thun par spyad pa dang / mang bar nyamasu blang ba dang / mi 'thun pa ma mchis par nan tan du bgyi ba'i tshul la spyad par bgyi'o/ /zhes nas bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs
pas/ rgyal po'i sras gzi brjid kyi bdag po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag gi lus 'di sems can dmyal ba yi/ /zhugs kyis yongs gdungs zhu bar gyur kyang rung / /khyod spyod
skal ba mnyam pa'i phyag rjed du/ /tshe rabs rgya mtshor bdag gis spro bar bgyi/ /tshe rabs mtha' yas skyes pa re re zhing / /bdag gi lus ni shin tu gtubs gshegs kyang / /
bstan dam sems kyis rab tu spro bar bgyis/ /dad dge khyod kyis bdag gi khyim thabs mdzod/ /'khor yug ri yis bskal pa mtha' yas su/ /bdag gi mgo ni yongs su
btangs gyur kyang / /sems la mi bde ma mchis dad par bgyid/ /khyod kyis rtag par bdag gi khyim thabs mdzod/ /khyod kyis tshe rabs grangs med thams cad du/ /bdag la
thugs bstan thugs kyis mnga' mdzad de/ /yan lag sha gtubs gzhan la stsal bar mdzod/ /khyod kyi chos la bdag kyang bstan gzhol gsol/ /bdag gi lus ni slad na
ma lus par/ /skyes bu lha'i sras po khyod la 'bul/ /bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ /skye bo slong ba rnams la dgyes par gsol/ /sems can kun la thugs rje mtha'
yas pa/ /bskyed de sems can rgya mtsho bsdu slad du/ /byang chub dam pa mchog tu khyod bzhugs pas/ /de slad bdag kyang thugs rjes gzung ba mdzod/ /longs spyod don dang nor gyi don ma
lags/ /'dod spyod dga' ba bskyed pa'i don slad du/ /sems can mchog khyod khyod 'tshal ma lags kyi/ /khyod dang spyod pa 'thun par spyod slad du/ /spyan gsal mdzes shing byams
pa'i thugs mnga' ba/ /khyod ni 'jig rten gzigs pa ci tshul lags/ /thugs rje che yi 'dod chags thugs mi mnga'/ de la thub dbang 'gyur ba gdon mi 'tshal/ /khyod kyi zhabs
kyis bcags pa'i sa rnams kyang / /dri med rin chen 'od du gnas pa las/ /khams gsum kun tu 'khor los bsgyur bar yang / /mtshan rab yongs kyis brgyan byon gdon mi 'tshal/ /
bdag gis g.yar la ma mthong dgung zhig la/ /chos bzang sprin 'od byang chub snying po yi/ /shing dbang drung na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas mang po du mas mdun du bdar/ /
rgyal ba'i dbang po sku mchog nyi ma de/ /'dzam bu chu klung rin chen 'tsher ba 'dra/ /g.yar lam mthong bar phyag gis bdag mgo byugs/ /de nas sang nas glo ba rab tu dga'/ /dga'
ba'i 'od ces bgyi ba rnam dag lus/ /sngan chad gnyen bshes gyur pa'i lha mo yis/ /bdag la bstan pa bde gshegs de nyid ni/ /snying po yang dag byang chub yongs la bzhugs/ /sngon
yang gzhon nu gzi brjid khyod blta zhes/ /bdag gis sems bskyed de ltar bsam par gyur/ /mdang sum dgung la lha mo dge ba yis/ /gzhon nu de ni mthong bar 'gyur zhes bstan/ /
bdag gi bde gshegs g.yar lam rmyi pas mthong / /yongs su dag pa'i sems can khyod kyang mthong / /yid bzhin bsam grub khyod dang bdag bcas pas/ /de ring rgyal ba de la mchod par
bgyi/ /de nas rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa'i mtshan thos te/ sangs rgyas blta ba'i skabs byung nas dga' ba dang mos pa'i shugs chen
po skyes te/ bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa la nor bu rin po che lnga brgyas mngon par gtor nas/ gtsug gi rin po che dpal gyi 'od 'bar ba zhes bya ba yang de la byin no/ /mye'i
mdog ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu rin po che dam pas brgyan pa'i gos rin po ches kyang de bkab bo/ /de ltar rim gror byas kyang dga' bar gyur pa'am/ nyams bde bar gyur pa lta bu'ang med la/ dga' ba
dang mos par yang mi 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du na thal mo sbyar cing myig mi 'gebs par gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i gdong du blta zhing gnas par gyur to/ /de nas smad 'tshong ma'i gtso mo blta na sdug
pas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bu mo 'di ni khyod gsal bgyi snyam nas/ /yun ring snga nas bdag gis bsam bsams ste/ /gzugs
mdzes de yang de ring khyod la phul/ /bsod nams legs brgyan yon tan rab dang ldan/ /tshul khrims blo dang yon tan gzhan gyis kyang / /bu mo dam pa 'di dang 'dra ba ni/ /mi'i 'jig rten gang na'ang
ma mchis te/ /'jig rten kun gyi bud med nang na mchog /pad mo'i sbubs nas skyes pas rigs smos pa/ /skyon gyi dri mas ma gos 'thad ma lags/ /ma lus skyon gyis ma gos sems dang
ldan/ /rtag par khyod kyi spyod tshul 'thun par 'gyur/ /reg na bde la kun nas 'phags pas na/ /'di'i lus ni shin tu 'jam pa ste/ /bro 'tshal nad pa gang la reg gyur kyang / /de'i mod la bro dang
bral bar 'gyur/ /'di'i lus las spos kyi ngad 'byung ba/ /spos mchog gzhan rnams mngon par zil gyis gnon/ /de'i dri zhim tshor ba rnam dag pa'i/ /tshul khrims gnas par mi rnams
kun kyang 'gyur/ /'di'i lus ni gser gyi mdog 'dra ste/ /pad mo'i mchog ltar rnam par rab tu gsal/ /khros pas bltas na byams pa'i sems ldan par/ /sems can ma lus kun
kyang rab tu 'gyur/ /'di'i tshig snyan yid du 'ong ba ste/ /nyams su bde bas 'gro ba nyan par dga'/ /thos na de rgyus skyon gyi mun pa dang / /mi dge sug las bgyid par mos mi 'gyur/ /'di ni
bsam dag yid la dri med de/ /'di la kun tu g.yo dang sgyu ma mchis/ /ji smra de dag yid la'ang de bzhin te/ /tshig dbyangs des ni 'gro ba tshim par bgyid/ /sgyu yis sems can 'drid par mi bgyid de/ /
nor gyi don du 'gro ba yongs mi slu/ /yid sems khrel gyi 'dzem dang ldan pa ste/ /rgan nam gzhon la'ang srid zhus spyod/ /rigs rgyud gzugs kyis dregs pa ma mchis te/ /'di ni
'khor gyis dregs pa'ang yong ma mchis/ /nga rgyal rlom sems yongs dang bral ba ste/ /'gro ba rnams la rtag tu gus par 'dud/ /de nas rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid kyi bdag po bu mo dga'

ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa 'khor dang bcas pa dang / bu mo stong phrag nyi shu dang / 'khor thams cad dang bcas par bza' shing gi ra ba spos kyi myu gu'i rtse mo nas 'od kyi sprin 'byung ba de
nas byung ste/ snying po byang chub chos kyis 'phags pa'i 'od gang na ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa gang na ba der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi
ma dam pa'i zhal blta ba dang / de la phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dong ste/ de rta babs sa'i bar du bzhon pas song nas babs te rkang pas/ bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa'i spyan sngar song ngo / /de nas rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag pos rgyang ring zhig nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu bzang ba blta na sdug pa dbang po zhi ba thugs zhi ba/ dbang po bsdams pa/ glang po ltar shin tu dul ba/ mtsho ltar dang zhing rnyog pa med la rnam par
gsal ba mthong ngo / /de ltar mthong nas de'i sems mngon par mos par gyur nas sangs rgyas mthong ba'i dga' ba dang / mos pa'i shugs chen po rnam par spel te/ dga' ba dang mos pa dang / spro ba
chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das de la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa la stsogs pa 'khor
thams cad dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ rin po che dam pa'i pad mo stong phrag lnga brgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mngon par gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das

de'i gtsug lag khang lnga brgya nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po spos sna tshogs las byas pa rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ lnga brgya brtsigs so/ /gtsug lag khang re re zhing yang
nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po stong phrag lnga brgyas rab tu brgyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pas gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i bsam pa thugs su chud
nas mdo sde sgo kun tu blta ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan to/ /de thos nas chos thams cad kyi tshul la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho phrag bcu thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob bo/ /dus gsum snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob po/ /
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor mngon du gyur par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob po/ /sems can 'byam klas pa thams cad rab tu snang bar bya ba la 'jug pa zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob po/ /'jig rten thams cad du 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba la zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob po/ /sems can thams cad

kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la 'jug pa snang ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob po/ /'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i ye shes kyi sprin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu
thob po/ /'gro ba thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la mngon du gyur pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra rnams dmyigs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob po/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par byed pa'i smon

lam gyi sprin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bcu po 'di dag la stsogs pa chos kyi tshul thams cad la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho phrag bcu rab tu thob par
gyur to/ /bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pas kyang ye shes thob par dka' ba rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sems nges par bzhag pa rab tu thob par gyur te/ bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid kyi bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa'i zhabs gnyis
la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas su bskor ba byas nas/ bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa dang / 'khor thams cad dang
bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan snga nas dong ngo / /de nas rgyal po'i gnas sdong po'i ri bo'i dpal gang na ba dang / rgyal po yab nor gyi bdag po gang na ba der dong ste/ drung du phyin nas/
rgyal po yab nor gyi bdag po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ don 'di brjod do/ /lha'i zhal snga nas mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sku nyi ma dam pa zhes bgyi ba mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo bsgyur ba/ lha dang mi

rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten tu byung ste/ khyod kyi khams 'di nyid kyi snying po byang chub chos kyi sprin shin tu sdug pa'i 'od ni rnam par spyod de/ mngon par sangs rgyas nas
ring po ma lags so/ /de nas rgyal po nor gyi bdag pos/ gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu khyod la don 'di lha 'am mi 'am su zhig gis sbran/ des
smras pa/ bdag la bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pas sbran to/ /de nas rgyal po nor gyi bdag pos sangs rgyas byung ba thos nas/ sangs rgyas skye ba la ni gter rab tu
thob pa tsam du sems/ sangs rgyas rin po che dang phrad par ni dka' bar sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas ni ngan song gi g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyang rnam par ldog par
sems/ nyon mongs pa'i nad chen po rab tu zhi bar bya ba la ni sman pa'i rgyal po dang phrad pa tsam du sems/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las ni yongs su 'brel ba yin par sems/
shin tu bde zhing ldan pa la ni rab tu gzhog par sems/ rab rib med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba ni yang dag par ston par sems/ ma rig pa'i mun pa bstsal ba la ni sgron ma chen po byung ba tsam du sems/
'jig rten mgon med pa las ni chos kyi tshul gyi mgon dang phrad par sems/ 'jig rten 'dren pa med pa las ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis theg pas 'dren pa skyes par sems shing sangs

rgyas byung bar thos pas mos pa dang / spro ba chen po skyes nas rgyal rigs dang bram ze dang ljongs kyi mi dang / yul gyi mi dang / blon po dang zham ring ba dang / gzhon nu dang rgyal phran dang / khams

kyi bdag po dang / 'khor thams cad kyang kun nas bsdus nas/ sangs rgyas byung bar sgra snyan pa sgrog pa'i gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po la rgyal po'i srid de yang chos kyi dga' bar byin no/ /de ltar
gzhon nu de rgyal srid la dbang bskur nas/ srog chags stong phrag bcu dang lhan gcig tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa gang na ba der song ste/ spyan sngar phyin nas/
bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar rang gi 'khor
dang bcas te 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pas/ rgyal po nor gyi bdag po dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la gzigs nas/ de'i tshe mdzod spu
nas 'od gzer 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba rab tu bkye'o/ /des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad mngon sum du
bkod nas/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bstan te/ sangs rgyas kyi 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par
sbyangs nas/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi byin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi sku 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs kyi
yan lag rgya mtsho thams cad dang ldan pas/ gzungs kyi sgo chos thams cad la rab rib med pa'i don gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba gzungs kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang bcas
par yang dag par bstan to/ /de nas rgyal po nor gyi bdag pos gzungs kyi sgo de thos nas chos thams cad la chos kyi snang ba chen po skyes par gyur to/ /'khor de'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dzam
bu gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kyang chos thams cad la rab rib med pa'i don gyi sgron ma'i gzungs rab tu thob par gyur to/ /khrag khrig drug bcus ni nye bar len pa med par zag pa las
sems rnam par grol lo/ /srog chags stong phrag bcu ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med par rnam par dag par gyur to/ /sems can grangs med pa zhig gis ni
sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yongs su bskyed de/ /phyogs bcur yang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bstan pa des
sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa theg pa gsum gyis dul bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po nor gyi bdag po chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa de'i yid la 'di snyam ste/ khyim na gnas pas ni
rnam pa 'di lta bu'i chos kyang khong du chud par mi nus la ye shes rnam pa 'di lta bu yang sgrub par mi nus kyis bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du rab tu 'byung ngo snyam nas/ brgyal po nor
gyi bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong gi tshul la mchis par ci gnang
zhes nas/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' bstsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de'i dus la bab par shes na rung ngo / /de nas rgyal po nor gyi bdag po srog chags stong phrag bcu dang lhan gcig tu
de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa'i zham ring du rab tu byung ngo / /de ltar rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon par gzungs kyi sgo chos thams cad la rab rib med pa'i don gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba de
'khor dang bcas par yongs su bsgrubs so/ /bsgoms so/ /shin tu bsgoms so/ /de snyed kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo yang rab tu thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa
bcu yang rab tu thob bo/ /so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du 'gro bar thogs pa med pa'i spyod yul
zhes bya ba'i lus yongs su dag pa yang rab tu thob ste/ des bcom ldan 'das de'i chos gyi 'khor lo yang dag par blangs so/ /yongs su bzungs ngo / /gtam gyi skyes bu yang byas
so/ /chos smra ba chen po yang byas so/ /bstan pa yongs su gzung ba yang byas so/ /mngon par shes pa thob pa'i stobs kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/
bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la lus yongs su bstan nas/ sangs rgyas byung ba de rab tu brjod pa dang / sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su bsgrub pa'i chos
nyid mngon par brjod pa dang / sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa de dag yongs su brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu de dag yongs su brjod par bya bas bstan

pa yongs su gzung ba byas so/ /rgyal po'i sras gzi brjid kyi bdag pos kyang de'i nyin par zla ba nya ste/ rgyas pa'i tshe rin po che bdun la yang rab tu thob par gyur te/ de khang pa'i steng na bud med kyi
tshogs kyis bskor cing 'dug pa'i mdun du 'khor lo rin po che chen po shugs la thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba rtsibs stong phrag brgya dang ldan pa rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi

'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las grub pa/ 'od kun tu 'byung ba rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa byung bar gyur to/ /glang po rin po che chen po rdo rje rin po che'i ri'i gzi brjid ces bya ba byung bar gyur to/ /

rta rin po che ri sngo rlung gi shugs shes bya ba byung bar gyur to/ /nor bu rin po che chen po'i nyi ma'i snying po 'od sprin rgyal po zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to/ /bu mo dga' ba'i 'od kyi dpal shin tu sbyangs pa de yang

bud med rin po cher byung bar gyur to/ /khyim bdag rin po che nor gyi phung po mang po zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to/ /blon po rin po che mig dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yang byung bar gyur to/ /de ltar bdun no de de ltar rin
po che bdun dang ldan pa'i rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba gling bzhi la dbang ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pa yul gyi mthu dang brtson 'grus su ldan par gyur te/
de la bu dpa' la brtul phod cing yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yod par gyur te/ des sa chen po 'di skyon med pa dang / dgra med pa dang gnod pa med

pa dang / 'tshe ba med pa dang / skyid pa dang phun sum tshogs pa dang / bde ba dang lo legs pa dang mdang dga' ba dang / skye bo'i mi mang pos yongasu gang ba yang ri dang rgya mtsho'i mthas klas par
chos kyi mngon par brgyan te/ gnas par byas so/ /des 'dzam bu'i gling de'i rgyal po'i gnas stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi dag tu yang rgyal po'i gnas re rer gtsug lag khang lnga brgya

byed du bcug ste/ thams cad kyang rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa sha stag go/ /longs spyod dang yo byad kyi rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa sha stag go/ /bza' shing gi ra ba dang / khang pa
dang 'chag sa dang / dus thams cad du bde bar spyad pa'i nags tshal gyi phreng bas rnam par brgyan pa sha stag go/ /gtsug lag khang re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod brten brtsigs pa ni
lhun gyi rgya shin tu che bar byas pa ste/ nang rin po che rnam pa mang pos brgyan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs kyis rnam par spras pa sha stag ste/ rgyal po'i gnas de thams cad du'ang bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa 'khor dang bcas pa/ grong khyer du gshegs par bya ba'i phyir spyan drangaso/ /rgyal po'i gnas de dag kun tu yang de bzhin gshegs pa
de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa thams cad du bsam gyis mi khyab pas mchod de/ sangs rgyas grong khyer du gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pas sems
can tshad med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir gshegs su gsol to/ /der yang sems can ma dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams ni dad pa thob par gyur to/ /dad pa dang ldan pa'i sems
can rnams ni sangs rgyas mthong bas dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar gyur to/ /dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel ba'i sems can rnams ni byang chub kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa
thob par gyur to/ /byang chub kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i sems can rnams ni snying rje chen po'i sems skyes par gyur to/ /sems can la phan par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams ni
sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su btsal ba la brtson par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul rnam pa la mkhas pa'i sems can rnams ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par khong du
chud par bya ba'i phyir sems mngon par gzhol bar gyur to/ /chos mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i phyir/ sems mngon par gzhol bar
gyur to/ /dus gsum gyi ye shes snang ba thob pa'i sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rnam par dmyigs par bya ba'i don du ye shes snang ba la zhugs par gyur to/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa sna tshogs rnam par dmyigs par bya ba la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i don du sems mngon par gzhol bar gyur to/ /'gro ba thams cad
yongs su bsdu ba la brtson pa'i sems can rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir smon lam bskyed par gyur to/ /lam gyi mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pa'i sems can
rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mngon par sgrub pa'i phyir ye shes snang ba bskyed par gyur to/ /chos rgya mtsho rnam par dbye ba la mngon par mos pa'i sems
can rnams ni zhing gi dra ba thams cad rang gi lus kyis rgyas par gang ba'i don du sems mngon par gzhol bar gyur to/ /zhing mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams ni sems
can thams cad gyi dbang po rgya mtsho yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir smon lam 'debs par gyur to/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dpyad pa la brtson pa'i
sems can rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir bsam pa rnam par dag par gyur to/ /sems can rnam pa de lta bu dag gi don rnam pa de lta bu de dag 'grub par 'gyur
ba mthong nas/ rgyal po gzi brjid kyi bdag pos sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pas sems can de dag yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul
ba'i don du rgyal po'i gnas de dag thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa gshegs su gsol to/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid
kyi bdag po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni/ khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po'i bu
gzi brjid kyi bdag po zhes bya ba 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid la dbang ba de bzhin gshegs pa sku nyi ma dam pa la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa de yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du
sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po nor gyi bdag po gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i yab du gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni de ltar mi blta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i

me tog gi 'od ces bya ba ni de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po nor gyi bdag po zhes bya bar gyur pa ste/ de ltar shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
mtsho'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i gzugs brnyan gyi sprin ces bya ba na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dbu ma dus gsum rab tu snang ba'i rin po che'i rgyal

po yongs su 'byung ba'i dbyings shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dpal gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba na/ snying po byang chub thams cad la dbang ba'i lus rab tu snang ba zhes bya bar

bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis bskor cing chos ston to/ /

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog ces bya ba des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i gzugs brnyan du snang

ba'i sprin yongs su dag par mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho der de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed gcig byung bar gyur pa dang / 'byung ba dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog gi 'od des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smyin par mdzad pa sha stag go/ /rigs kyi bu
de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i btsun mo pad mo dpal gyi snying po 'byung ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po'i yum du gyur pa bud med stong phrag brgya
